title: Watermelon + Arugula-la Salad With White Cannellini Beans+ Lemo
summary: Watermelon + Arugula-la Salad With White Cannellini Beans+ Lemo might be just the side dish you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains approximately 6g of protein, 19g of fat, and a total of 226 calories. For $1.3 per serving, this recipe covers 7% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. 4 people have made this recipe and would make it again. It can be enjoyed any time, but it is especially good for Summer. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and vegetarian diet. A mixture of watermelon, cannellini beans, chevre: aka goat cheese, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 46%, this dish is pretty good. Try Cavatappi with Arugulan and Cannellini Beans, Arugula Salad With White Beans And Pesto, and Cannellini Bean, Red Onion, and Arugula Salad for similar recipes.
